Sentencas: The high installation cost is the major obstacle of the commercialization of the solid oxide fuel cell for distributed power generation.
Titulo: Low cost fuel cell converter system for residential power generation

Sentencas: This paper presents a new low cost 10-kW converter system to overcome this obstacle.
Titulo: Low cost fuel cell converter system for residential power generation

Sentencas: The proposed system consists of an isolated dc-dc converter to boost the fuel cell voltage to 400 V dc and a pulse-width modulated inverter with filter to convert the dc voltage to two split-phase 120-V ac.
Titulo: Low cost fuel cell converter system for residential power generation

Sentencas: The dc-dc converter uses phase shifting to control power flow through a transformer with a metal oxide semiconductor field effect transistor full bridge on the low voltage side and a voltage doubler on the high voltage side.
Titulo: Low cost fuel cell converter system for residential power generation

Sentencas: One IPM is used to realize the voltage doubler and the dc-ac inverter.
Titulo: Low cost fuel cell converter system for residential power generation

Sentencas: Compared to the existing fuel cell converter systems, the proposed circuit has low cost, less component count, smaller size, and reduced dc-dc converter peak current.
Titulo: Low cost fuel cell converter system for residential power generation

Sentencas: Simulation and experimental results are demonstrated.
Titulo: Low cost fuel cell converter system for residential power generation
